Rational.origin: [age distinctions are not subject to strict scrutiny, but they must have a relationship to a legitimate state interest " In re J. M. , 642 A.2d 1062 (1994)"]

2.definition: relating to, based on, or guided by reason, principle, fairness, logic, a legitimate state interest, or a consideration of fact [age distinctions are not subject to strict scrutiny, but they must have a relationship to a legitimate state interest ", 642 A.2d 1062 (1994)"]
